title: Craig Kilborn, Football Is Back + Mt Rushmore Of Ways To Say Goodbye
description:
Football is back and we have training camp to talk about. Kylerâ€™s insult contract plus Russ Wilson is more and more a robot every day. (00:02:23-00:19:55) Mt Rushmore of ways to say goodbye. (00:21:04-00:41:15) Craig Kilborn joins the show to talk about his new podcast, his career in sports and late night television and all time Clint Eastwood story. (00:42:08-01:23:54) We finish with Fyre Fest of the week (01:25:19-01:40:46)


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/PardonMyTake
